name: Stuffed Mushrooms II
author: Judy
summary: Mushrooms stuffed with crabmeat. You can substitute chopped dill for the chopped parsley.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Chop enough stem to yield one cup
Use a pastry brush to brush the caps with vegetable oil
In a skillet, melt 2 tablespoons butter or margarine
Add chopped stems and onion to the hot butter
Saute the mixture for 4 minutes, remove it from the heat and let cool
In a large mixing bowl, combine the mushroom-onion mixture, crabmeat, cream cheese, egg, 1 cup bread crumbs, parsley, salt, and pepper
Spoon the mixture into the mushroom caps
Arrange the caps on the prepared cookie sheet
In a small skillet, melt the remaining butter and add the remaining bread crumbs to the melted butter
Once the bread crumbs are coated lightly sprinkle them over the mushroom caps
